descriptionHtml:
Hi skyrim modder's im french sry if my english is not clear.

I noe this is another mountains texture we have so many but many rock dont have proper normal map or global aspect is not good.
It is a personnal home made.

At close or far range the global aspect is good. Is for me the more imersive rock feeling from every texture i have see for now in skyrim.

Do not only use the normal map alone, becose on rock texture have a grey color transition perfectly following the normal map and this give
the good rock feeling.

The rock look very beter with ENB, every each ENB setting will change the rock feeling never know what is the best.
on vanila render it dont look really good if ur game is to dark this texture will not imersive.

The actual screen shot is doing with my personnal ENB set up.

Recomended MOD :

Static Mesh Improvement Mod - is recomended with this texture you can only install the rock.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?

Skyrim High Definition LODs
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52901/?

Skyrim High Definition LODs - Dark LOD Textures
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58818/?

REAL uGRIDS to load SOLUTION and MORE
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48387/?

Stable uGridsToLoad
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41592/?

Texture is 4K or 2K and nomal is 2k or 1K resolution.


Try it :).
author: bigoudi
